alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:25PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Imperial County through 315 PM PDT... At 225 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Gordon`s Well, or 21 miles northwest of Gadsden, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Centro, Imperial, Holtville, Gordon`s Well, Algodones Dunes, Bonds Corner, Heber, Glamis and Seeley. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 30 and 83. CA Route 78 between mile markers 21 and 46. CA Route 111 between mile markers 3 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial Valley
